messages.subject: New forum
messages.msgSnippet: An online aquaintance started a new forum I thought some of you might enjoy participating in. Ami McKay is a writer, and an unschooling Mum living in Nova
messages.messageBody:
An online aquaintance started a new forum I thought some of you
might enjoy participating in.
Ami McKay is a writer, and an unschooling Mum living in Nova Scotia.
Her forum has some neat stuff for writers (including a new poetry
contest) and the unschooling area seems to be taking off as well.
Check it out:
http://www.amimckay.com/forum/index.php

She's written some articles for soulfulliving.com, if some of you
read there. I adore her writing....her online blog is a fun read too.

Ren
